original_text: They will show that God is very angry with you. You and your descendants will know that for ever.
korean_text: 이 모든 저주가 너와 네 자손에게 영원히 있어서 표징과 훈계가 되리라

sentences.original_text: that God is very angry with you
You and your descendants will know
sentences.korean_translation: 너와 네 자손이 알게 될 것이다
